title: How to burn a HD DVD - Quora

response.answer_text: Step 1:Download and Launch Sothink Free Movie DVD Maker. And then load the source  Step 2: Personalize the output DVD After source loading, move to the right pane and choose the output size between DVD 9 and DVD 5, then select the output directory to burn the video to blank DVD disc, be an ISO file or a folder at the Save to part, and click the Next button to continue.    Step 3: Start the DVD making task Click the Start button at the bottom right corner of the interface, Sothink will immediately begin the DVD making task and provide the detailed progress info during the process.

Firstly your source video needs to have a high bit rate.  Assuming you recorded video in mts format with a HD video camera then you need to convert the file to the highest bit rate that DVD supports. Some file converters output DVD at 8000 kbits/s. This will give you a HD quality DVD. It is much better to simply store all your raw mts files on a portable USB3 drive. They can be played back on Windows 8 pcs, PS3 and X-Box.
